title: Privacy Policy
introduction: This application is a training project developed for educational purposes only.
data_collection: We do not collect, store, or share any personal information from users. Any data used within the app is for demonstration and testing purposes only.
third_party_services: The app may use third-party services or public APIs for learning purposes. These services may collect information according to their own privacy policies.
children: This application is not intended for children under the age of 13.
updates: This Privacy Policy may be updated at any time as part of the development process.
contact: If you have any questions regarding this Privacy Policy, please contact the developer on +963954534719.
about_us_contain: Welcome to our platform — your trusted space for connecting skilled service providers with customers who need them.We believe in making everyday life easier by helping people find reliable professionals for tasks like home maintenance,personal care, logistics, tutoring
no_message_contain: you don’t have any new updates right now. We’ll notify you when there’s something important.
